member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf
member.summary: An edit-like control for placing on the dialog boxes that picks a type name from a tree or completion list.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModes
member.summary: Whether the completion list is allowed to be shown at the moment. Other filters could apply (eg will not be actually visible if there are no items).

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModes.Show
member.summary: The completion list could be visible if other factors (like items>0) are met.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModes.HideSoft
member.summary: The completion list has been hidden indeliberately, and should transition to when there's an excuse.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModes.HideHard
member.summary: The completion list has been forcibly hidden. Should not show again unless explicitly requested by the user.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModeTransition
member.summary: Flag for transitioning between .

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModeTransition.Soft
member.summary: Switches softly, cannot break . This is for handling implicit activities.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModeTransition.Hard
member.summary: Switches forcibly, always transitions to the desired state. Must be done on explicit user actions only.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CommitCompletionListInputString
member.summary: Immediately commits the to the completion lists model. Wired to the deferred binding when the completion list menu is lazy-created.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListExecuteSelectedItem
member.summary: Exec sel menu item, if any. Returns exec success flag ().

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListSelectNextItem
member.summary: Selects the next item in the completion drop-down list, eg when up/down arrows are used in the edit box.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.IsCompletionListVisible
member.summary: Gets whether we've ruled out that the completion list should be visible at the moment. This means is and the 's are not empty (and the model exists, in the first place).

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.myEvtUpdateTextBeforeCaret
member.summary: As we can't (so it seems) get the event of caret movement in the edit box, we'd update it every so often. Probably the caret position can't change without a Windows message on the control, so we'd apply the change after each message, with a small delay needed just to group multiple consequent messages together. GEvent is better than BeginInvoke because the latter adds to the messages itself and cannot guarantee all fo the dependent messages go thru before it executes.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CaretPosition
member.summary: Gives out the current caret position in the edit box, or the selection start position.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowMode
member.summary: Whether the completion list is allowed to be shown at the moment. Other filters could apply (eg will not be actually visible if there are no items).

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.Settings
member.summary: Gets or sets the settings that define the behavior of the picker, like what it picks and which functionality is available. Can be set only once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.Text
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the editbox the user is typing.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.TextBeforeCaret
member.summary: Gets or sets the text of the editbox the user is typing, up to the current caret position or the selection start. Could be used as the completion prefix.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.ExecuteCompletionListItem(JetBrains.Application.UI.Controls.JetPopupMenu.Detail.JetPopupMenuItem)
member.summary: If menu is shown, selects the given item and applies its text.

member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListHide(JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModeTransition)
member.summary: Hides the completion list, either the soft or the hard way. Modifies based on its present value and the .

member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShow(JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionEditWpf.CompletionListShowModeTransition)
member.summary: Shows the completion list, either the soft or the hard way. Modifies based on its present value and the . Eg a soft-show won't actually show if currently in mode.

member.name: T:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings
member.summary: Specifies the configuration for the "CompletionPickerEdit" control.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings.CompletionModel
member.summary: Gets or sets the flat model that works for completing the text you type into the control. Can be set only once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings.ExpandPickerItem
member.summary: When the tree picker is building its model, supplies the items for the next level. Fill the list with the children of , who must not be Null. When is Null, root items are requested.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings.IsSelectingAllTextOnCompletion
member.summary: When user executes a completion list item or a picker tree item and its text is planted into the editbox (replacing any existing selection), determines whether the whole contents of the edit box is selected. The default is True, which helps with correcting any mistaken selection. False is recommended when you implement sequential completion.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings.PickerItemPresenter
member.summary: Gets or sets the presenter for the picker (drop-down tree) items. This value can only be set once.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings.TranslateCompletionItem
member.summary: When a completion list item is executed, its text is inserted into the edit box. In case the text should be modified before insertion (eg FQN instead of a short name), this event should be sinked.

member.name: F:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.Controls.CompletionFrontendPickerSettings.TranslatePickerItem
member.summary: When a picker tree item is executed, its text is inserted into the edit box. In case the text should be modified before insertion (eg FQN instead of a short name), this event should be sinked. Setting the to Null prevents the item from being picked (eg for group nodes that are only present to hold the child elements).

member.name: M:JetBrains.Platform.UIInteractive.Ide.TreeGridBrowser.TreeModelIteratorHelper.Enumerate(JetBrains.Application.UI.TreeModels.TreeModel,System.Func{JetBrains.Application.UI.TreeModels.TreeModelNode,System.Boolean})
member.summary: Enumerates all nodes of the given tree model
member.param: Predicate is required to prevent endless traversing in case of 'infinite' tree model, it defines if we are allowed to get into the given node's children

member.summary: Get next node in the tree
member.param: Node that uses as a base one to calc a next one related to it
Predicate is required to prevent endless traversing in case of 'infinite' tree model, it defines if we are allowed to get into the given node's children
member.returns: Next node or null if there is no nodes further

member.summary: Get previous node in the tree
member.param: Node that uses as a base one to calc a previous one related to or null (roots will be used)
Predicate is required to prevent endless traversing in case of 'infinite' tree model, it defines if we are allowed to get into the given node's children
member.returns: Next node or null if there is no nodes further
